DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety pharmacokinetics probucol multiple oral administration healthy male subject .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate safety pharmacokinetics probucol multiple oral administration one 250-mg probucol tablet daily breakfast ( 250 mg/day ) , two 250-mg probucol tablet daily breakfast ( 500 mg/day ) , one 250-mg probucol tablet twice daily breakfast dinner ( 500 mg/day ) 14 day healthy male subject .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Korean Male Age 20 40 year time inform consent BMI 19.0 less 25.0 Subjects meet follow criterion time screen Subjects ECG result without AV block qTc QRS width within standard value Exclusion criterion History clinical evidence significant medical history Present previous significant drug allergy prescription OTC medication
